summary:
Rusty Version of the Good Old Iron Weapons :)
Do note that this replace the old iron weapons with rusty looking ones.
They are not over done, just changed to be more realistic looking weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Changes the texture of the Iron weapons in skyrim to more realistic looking Rusty version.

The reason i changed the texture of the Iron weapons is because i did not think they were realistic looking enough with the plain new shiny looks of them :) i mean if you find a iron sword out in the wildernes it will NOT look new it wil be rusted :)
and thats what my little texture replacement is all about, make it Rusty!
[IMG]http://i1271.photobucket.com/albums/jj636/RayRay0202/SkyrimRusty.jpg[/IMG]
___________________________________________-
INSTALATION:

Just drag and drop the texture folder into Skyrim Data.

________________________________________________________________________________-
author: Rayvales
